product.title: Skye Lava Red (Blackout)
product.description: The elegant silver or white fascia and side channels house roller fabric discreetly within the roof window. Skye roof blinds have been designed to fit velux, rooflite, keylite, fakro and dakstra roof windows. All parts are supplied to fit the blind direct to your choice of branded skylight window.
